remarks: The class of (different!) words resulting by cyclically shifting something (not necessarily a word) is a set.  (Contributed by AV, 8-Jun-2018.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro/AV, 25-Oct-2018.)
statement:
cshwsexa $p |- { w e. Word V | E. n e. ( 0 ..^ ( # ` W ) ) ( W cyclShift n ) = w } e. _V $.
$d V n $.
$d W n w $.
